overview: Street photographer Jay Giampietro details his clandestine process of capturing the odd fringes of New York City on Instagram, in this short documentary piece by Joe Stankus. Not content with showing how Giampietro sneaks his snaps, Stankus also delves into the ethics of photographing strangers − sometimes during intimate moments − in a time of mass surveillance.
title: I've never been a Fisherman
